amendment.description: Page 77, beginning line 4, strike subsection (b) and insert the following new subsection: (b) Certain Exclusions- (1) CERTAIN LANDS EXCLUDED- Subsection (a) does not apply to-- ***.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in House Report 115-378 to add land exclusions to Sec. 913, including Yaquina Head Outstanding Natural Area, Wild and Scenic Rivers Act, Wilderness Act, lands managed under the National Trails System.

vote.text: On agreeing to the DeFazio amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. DeFazio.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the DeFazio amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
